system.description: This spell creates a shimmering, swordlike plane of force that strikes at any opponent within range as you desire. The sword attacks its designated target once each round on your turn. Attack bonus: caster level + Int or Cha bonus + 3 enhancement. It deals 4d6+3 force damage, threat 19-20, x2 critical. As a force effect it can strike ethereal and incorporeal creatures. You can use a standard action each round to switch the sword to a new target. The sword cannot be physically attacked; dispel magic, disintegrate, sphere of annihilation, or rod of cancellation affect it. AC 13. If the target has spell resistance, check on first strike; if resisted, spell is dispelled.

components.materialDescription: Focus: a miniature platinum sword with copper and zinc grip and pommel (250 gp).
